title: Beef empanadas with olives and raisins
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter', '2 medium onions, chopped', '1 spring onion, chopped', '250g minced beef', '50g green Spanish olives, pitted and chopped', '3 tablespoons raisins', '2 hard boiled eggs, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '12 empanada pastry discs', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
